import React from 'react'; import { LazyLoadImage } from 'react-lazy-load-image-component'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import 'react-lazy-load-image-component/src/effects/blur.css'; const MissionSection = ({ title, image, alt, children, reverse = false }) => (

{title}

{children}
); function OurMission() { return (
{/* Header */}

üåç Our Mission: A Greener Tomorrow

Together, we tackle e-waste challenges in India and across the globe by enabling smarter, safer, and sustainable disposal of electronics.

<>

We're creating an ecosystem where disposing of e-waste is easy, transparent, and environmentally responsible. From urban tech parks to rural communities, our services are inclusive and accessible.

Our platform allows users to schedule pickups, get eco-rewards, track item lifecycles, and even donate old electronics to charities. We collaborate with certified recyclers to ensure ethical processing.

Through our educational initiatives, we're raising awareness about the dangers of improper e-waste disposal and promoting circular economy practices.

<>

India generates over 3.2M tons of e-waste annually, with 90% handled unsafely by the informal sector, leading to toxic pollution and health hazards.

E-waste contains 100x more gold than gold ore, yet millions of tons are lost to improper disposal. Workers in informal units face daily exposure to carcinogens.

Our mission is to transform this landscape through technology-driven solutions, community empowerment, and sustainable practices.

<>

Launched in 2025 during the global e-waste crisis (60M+ tons), we began as a pilot in Bengaluru and Mumbai.

Gained rapid traction through partnerships with local municipalities, tech parks, and educational institutions.

Currently expanding to 15 Indian cities with plans to establish 500+ smart collection points by 2026.

<>

Leveraging AI and IoT for real-time waste tracking and smart logistics optimization.

Developing blockchain-based material tracing to ensure ethical recycling practices.

Partnering with manufacturers to implement Extended Producer Responsibility (EPR) programs.

Pilot testing AI-powered sorting robots that increase recycling efficiency by 40%.

{/* Call to Action */}

üå± Join the E-Waste Revolution

For Individuals

Schedule pickups, earn rewards, track impact

Get Started ‚Üí

© 2025 E-Waste Manager

Building a sustainable future, one device at a time üåø

); } export default OurMission;
